  • Classes in model used by controller
    Class
    Description
    Enemy
    model of an enemy character
    SoftWall
    model of a soft wall (wall that can be destroyed by a bomb) implements Hiding as soft walls can hide power ups and exit

    model of a generic element of the game (e.g. characters, items etc)

    model of an enemy character
    GameBoard
    the board the game is played on
    Hidable
    this interface has the sole purpose of marking objects as Hidable (e.g. power ups and the exit).

    Item
    class used to group and separate items (e.g. power ups, exit) from other types of elements

    model of Player
    PowerUp
    model of power up. implements hidable as power ups can be hidden behind enemies and soft walls
